sentence.Network_en: There seems to be a grudging acceptance of the situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一局面看来已经被勉强接受。

sentence.Network_en: He even earned his opponents' grudging respect.
sentence.Network_cn: 他甚至令对手也不得不尊重他。

sentence.Network_en: His tough stand won some grudging admiration.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的强硬态度使得一些对他不满的人也不由得感到钦佩。

entry.def: A grudging feeling or action is felt or done very unwillingly.

example.ex: He even earned his opponents' grudging respect...
example.tran: 他甚至令对手也不得不尊重他。

example.ex: There seems to be a grudging acceptance of the situation.
example.tran: 这一局面看来已经被勉强接受。
